{"step_by_step_thinking": "The appropriate test for comparing the weights of two groups of newborns is the Student's T-test. This test is used to compare the means of two independent groups. In this case, the two groups are the newborns whose mothers received food supplements and the newborns whose mothers did not receive food supplements. The T-test will determine if there is a statistically significant difference in the mean weights between the two groups.", "answer_choice": "C. Student's T-test"}
